description.full: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, Local Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Define your legacy young Arkadian Warrior - Defeat the evil Gorgon herself as soldier, archer or sorceress and return the land of Arkadia back to it's people. Unlock the full game now. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
description.short: Define your legacy… Awaken your inner-beast… Fight with one of Artemis’ three powerful warriors to the ultimate confrontation with Gorgon herself. Choose the Soldier, the Archer or the Sorceress, each with their own unique attacks before embarking on the ultimate journey to return mythical land of Arkadia to the people.
